mapper.update: insert all into pj(pj_no, pj_name, pj_content, pj_creator, pj_start_date, pj_end_date) values (pj_seq.nextval, #{pj_name}, #{pj_content}, #{pj_creator}, #{pj_start_date, jdbcType=DATE}, #{pj_end_date, jdbcType=DATE}) into pj_file(pj_file_no, pj_no, save_filename, original_filename) values (pj_file_seq.nextval, pj_seq.currval, #{saveFilename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originalFilename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) into cli(client_no, pj_no, client_name) values (cli_seq.nextval, pj_seq.currval, #{client_name}) into pj_member(pj_member_no, pj_no, pj_join_type, pj_member_join_date) values (#{pj_member_no}, pj_seq.currval, #{pj_join_type}, SYSDATE) select*from dual
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM pj a JOIN emp b ON a.pj_no = b.emp_no

SELECT a.pj_no, pj_name, pj_creator, pj_start_date, pj_end_date FROM pj a JOIN pj_member d ON a.pj_no = d.pj_no
pj_member_no = #{login_emp}
AND
ORDER BY pj_no DESC

SELECT a.emp_no, b.dept_name, c.emp_name, d.pos_name FROM emp_history a LEFT OUTER JOIN dept b ON a.dept_no = b.dept_no LEFT OUTER JOIN emp c ON a.emp_no = c.emp_no LEFT OUTER JOIN pos d ON a.pos_no = d.pos_no
( INSTR(c.${condition}, #{keyword}) > 0 )
( INSTR(a.${condition}, #{keyword}) > 0 )
